summary_md: Serbia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 8,576 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 4.67% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 7.39% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 76.22 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 85.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 52.69% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Serbia's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 8,576 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an export growth rate of 52.69% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Serbia shows an unemployment rate of 7.39% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating the percentage of the workforce that is jobless.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Serbia is relatively high, with usage at 85.40% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), suggesting a significant portion of the population has access to digital services.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Serbia is 76.22 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the overall health environment of the country.
